content: Has anyone good advice on representing a 'copy-to' (CC) recipients list on a ServiceRequest so result copies can be distributed to other relevant parties? Thinking mainly pathology and imaging requests...
Sounds like you'd need an extension with references to practitioner and/or practitionerrole and organization and maybe relatedperson
see this tracker which references discussion on the cc J#20932
Wrong tracker? I don't think this one is related to a cc: list

Eric Haas said:

see this tracker which references discussion on the cc J#20932

oops corrected above
thanks all - that tracker is looking like the future - much appreciated
